Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: sighting detailsi was standing outside smoking a cigarette and watching a plane when i noticed what looked like a orange star that seemed to be moving. as i watched the light it started to glow and turned bright white and increased in size by roughly 3-5 times. at the same time it started dropping orange ball of fire from the bottom. after it dropped the balls it dimmed and change back to a a a orange\reddish color, then it moved a couple of miles to the left and dimmed a little more then it moved back to it's original position, flickered and then it started moving off to the right and all lights went out and it looked to be changing from solid to transparent, then it disapeered.
Summary: Object was orange and small then turn bright white and large and dropped fire balls.
